title: Skate Shop Logo
content:
This is my first post here in Typophile!  
I'm doing a logo for a skate shop, and this is my first draft. What you guys think of it?  
I was going for a nyc tag style, large marker and script like.

Emiliano Amadei

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [nyquist.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020220329/http:/typophile.com/files/nyquist.pdf) | 6.32 KB |
author: Emiliano Amadei

comments.content:
You might soften it a bit, and add separation between the letters.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020220329im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nyquist-1_6697.gif)
